title:
LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector, HD Ultra-thin, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Pixel 8; fingerprint Compatible; Military-grade shatterproof; screen protection and camera lens protection;
original visual experience; high-response haptic touch
descriptions:
### LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector

**Product Overview:**
Enhance the protection and performance of your Google Pixel 8 with the LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector and Camera Lens Protector. This comprehensive protection kit includes two ultra-thin, 9H hardness tempered glass screen protectors and two camera lens protectors, ensuring your device remains safe from scratches, drops, and everyday wear and tear. The set also comes with all the necessary installation accessories to make the application process smooth and straightforward.

**Package Contents:**
- 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protectors
- 2x Camera Lens Protectors
- Installation Accessories (dust remover, alcohol wipes, microfiber cloth)

**Screen Protector Features:**
- **Material:** 9H Hardness Tempered Glass
- **Properties:**
  - **HD Ultra-thin:** Maintains high-definition visuals and original screen clarity.
  - **Military-grade Shatterproof:** Provides robust protection against drops and impacts.
  - **Edge Strengthening Design:** Reinforces the edges to prevent chipping and cracking.
  - **Fingerprint Compatible:** Minimizes fingerprint marks for a cleaner screen.
  - **High-response Haptic Touch:** Ensures smooth and responsive touch performance.

**Camera Lens Protector Features:**
- **Material:** 9H Hardness Tempered Glass
- **Properties:**
  - **Scratch Resistant:** Protects against scratches from everyday use.
  - **Shatterproof:** Safeguards your camera lens from drops and impacts.

**Visual Experience:**
- **High Definition:** Maintains the original visual quality of your screen, ensuring a clear and vibrant display.

**Customer Service:**
- **Lifetime Service:** Enjoy lifetime customer support with a quick response time of within 24 hours. We are committed to providing you with the best assistance and support.

**Why Choose LK?**
- **Comprehensive Protection:** With both screen and camera lens protectors, you get complete coverage for your Google Pixel 8.
- **Ease of Installation:** The included installation accessories make it easy to apply the protectors without any bubbles or dust.
- **Quality Materials:** 9H hardness tempered glass ensures durability and longevity.
- **User-Friendly:** Designed to be fingerprint compatible and touch-sensitive, enhancing your user experience.

**Compatibility:**
- **Google Pixel 8**

**Customer Satisfaction:**
At LK, we are dedicated to your satisfaction. If you have any issues or questions, our customer support team is always ready to assist you. Buy with confidence knowing that your purchase is backed by our lifetime service guarantee.

**Order Now:**
Protect your Google Pixel 8 with the LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector and Camera Lens Protector. Get yours today and enjoy peace of mind knowing your device is well-protected.
